item.title: II PU exam results: Raichur district sees no improvement
item.description:
<![CDATA[With no improvement to show, Raichur district has maintained the same status, 30th place in the State ranking list, after the II PU results were announced on Tuesday.
The district was in 30th place after the results were announced in 2024 and now, stands in the same place with a 58.75 pass percentage.
A total of 18,414 students, including those from urban and rural areas, appeared for the examination, and 10,818 (58.75%) of them passed it.
The stream-wise results are as follows:
Arts: 9,628 ...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Raichur: Girl found dead in canal, search on for her brother
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Girl found dead in canal, search on for her brother
Vartha Bharati | 08-04-2025 | 17:47:00 IST
Representational Image
Raichur (Karnataka), Apr 8 (PTI): Body of a minor girl who had gone missing along with her brother was recovered from a canal in this district while search is on for her sibling, police said on Monday.
The children had come to Gandhal village in Raichur district with their parents on a pilgrimage to Panchamukhi Hanuman temple.
ALSO READ: Three children drown in Vi...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
